# Railway Template Gallery

Browse our collection of production-ready Railway deployment templates.

<div class="template-grid" markdown>

<div class="template-card" markdown>

### LiteLLM + Langfuse Starter

Production-ready LLM proxy with full observability. Deploy a unified API for 100+ LLM providers with cost tracking and request tracing.

**Features:**

- 100+ LLM providers via unified API
- Full request tracing in Langfuse
- Cost tracking per request
- Virtual keys & budgets

**Estimated Cost:** ~$29-68/month

[:octicons-rocket-16: Deploy](https://railway.app/template/litellm-langfuse){ .md-button .md-button--primary }
[:octicons-mark-github-16: GitHub](https://github.com/amiable-dev/litellm-langfuse-railway/tree/main/starter){ .md-button }

</div>

<div class="template-card" markdown>

### LiteLLM + Langfuse Production

Enterprise-grade LLM infrastructure with automated backups, health monitoring, and alerting.

**Everything in Starter, plus:**

- Automated daily backups (MinIO)
- Health monitoring & alerts
- Redis with AOF persistence
- PagerDuty integration
- Operations runbook

**Estimated Cost:** ~$33-78/month

[:octicons-mark-github-16: GitHub](https://github.com/amiable-dev/litellm-langfuse-railway/tree/main/production){ .md-button }

</div>

<div class="template-card" markdown>

### LLM Council

Multi-model consensus system for AI decision-making. Get synthesized verdicts from multiple LLM providers.

**Features:**

- Multi-model deliberation
- Peer review synthesis
- MCP server integration
- Configurable tiers (quick/balanced/high)

[:octicons-mark-github-16: GitHub](https://github.com/amiable-dev/llm-council){ .md-button }
[:octicons-book-16: Docs](https://github.com/amiable-dev/llm-council#readme){ .md-button }

</div>

</div>

## Template Categories

### Observability & Monitoring

Templates for LLM observability, tracing, and cost monitoring.

| Template | Description | Status |
|----------|-------------|--------|
| LiteLLM + Langfuse Starter | Basic LLM gateway with tracing | Stable |
| LiteLLM + Langfuse Production | Production-ready with backups | Stable |

### AI Infrastructure

Templates for AI/ML infrastructure and tooling.

| Template | Description | Status |
|----------|-------------|--------|
| LLM Council | Multi-model consensus system | Stable |

## Adding Your Template

Want to add your Railway template to this gallery?

1. Ensure your template repository has documentation
2. Open a [Feature Request](https://github.com/amiable-dev/amiable-templates/issues/new?template=feature_request.md)
3. We'll review and add it to the registry

See our [Contributing Guide](../contributing.md) for details.
